specific_topics.specific_topic: Identifying the main ideas of the passage
specific_topics.description: Identify the central theme or main idea of a passage, focusing on the primary argument or message conveyed by the text.

subtopics.description: Questions focused on identifying the main ideas of the passage.

specific_topics.description: Identify and understand supporting details, facts, and examples that reinforce the main ideas in a passage.

subtopics.description: Questions focused on recognizing supporting details in the passage.

specific_topics.description: Draw logical conclusions from the passage based on information that is implied rather than directly stated.

subtopics.description: Questions focused on making inferences based on context.

specific_topics.description: Analyze the organization and structure of a passage, understanding how each part of the text contributes to the overall argument.

subtopics.description: Questions focused on understanding the structure of the passage.

specific_topics.specific_topic: Evaluating logic and reasoning in the passage
specific_topics.description: Evaluate the reasoning behind arguments and ideas presented in the passage, assessing the validity and effectiveness of the logic used.

subtopics.description: Questions focused on evaluating the logic and reasoning in the passage.
